mapper.insert: MERGE INTO REFRESH_TOKEN rt USING (SELECT #{userId} AS userId, #{refreshToken} AS refreshToken FROM dual) input ON (rt.USERID = input.userId) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET rt.REFRESH_TOKEN = input.refreshToken WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (USERID, REFRESH_TOKEN) VALUES (input.userId, input.refreshToken)
mapper.select: SELECT USERID AS userId, REFRESH_TOKEN AS refreshToken FROM REFRESH_TOKEN WHERE USERID = #{userId}
